LIST.TITLE: Globant
LIST.DESCRIPTION: I participated in the development of a front-end backoffice for the company COTO, using Angular 19. We implemented the Signals API, ensured code quality with tools like SonarQube, Prettier, and ESLint, and developed automated tests with Jest.

LIST.TITLE: Globant
LIST.DESCRIPTION: I worked on the development and maintenance of a front-end backoffice for AES Corporation, specifically within the inventory management module. My main focus was on refactoring legacy code.

LIST.TITLE: Globant
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Worked as a frontend developer using Angular for GDN company, in a team of around 15 people. The project focused on enabling users to accumulate points with their supermarket purchases, which would later be redeemed for various rewards and benefits.

LIST.TITLE: Likida
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Likida was a startup aiming to create a platform for buying, selling, lending, and auctioning NFTs. The technologies used included Angular for the frontend and Strapi, a JavaScript-based backend.

LIST.TITLE: Mangoo Dev
